sentences.en: a clumsy attempt to spike rumours of a cabinet split
sentences.cn: 企图阻止在报纸上传播内阁分裂谣言的笨拙做法

sentences.en: A spike is quicker than a slam.
Although you'd think business would have boomed during the war, there was only a small spike in interest.
sentences.cn: 人们会认为战争期间生意会很红火，但实际上利息只有小幅上升。

sentences.en: An influence on a post - synaptic neuron which reduces the probability that the neuron emit a spike.
sentences.cn: 施加在突触后神经元上的、使其减少发出冲动的一种影响.

sentences.en: Certain street drugs, such as cocaine and methamphetamine, can cause a spike.
sentences.cn: 街头毒品, 如可卡因和甲基苯丙胺可导致血压的突然升高.

sentences.en: Grip the spike with your foot ! Okay, okay , okay.
sentences.cn: 用脚踩牢钉子!好的! 很好! 很好!

sentences.en: He brought the hammer flashing down, banging the spike squarely on the head.
sentences.cn: 他闪电似地用锤猛砸下去, 不偏不倚,正好击中道钉.

sentences.en: Spike Milligan has finally got the gong he had been promised.
sentences.cn: 斯派克·米利根最终拿到了早就承诺给他的那块奖章。

sentences.en: The desired operator is the spike doublet of Figure 40.
sentences.cn: 欲求的因子为图40那样的脉冲偶极子.

sentences.en: The generous packages led to a huge spike in Nomura's costs.
sentences.cn: 这一慷慨方案导致野村的成本大幅飙升.

sentences.en: The magnitude of the spike and of the reversal varies in different heart tissues.
sentences.cn: 峰电位和极性倒转的幅度,随不同类型的心肌组织而异.

sentences.en: The probability curve would have collapsed to a narrow spike.
sentences.cn: 几率线则会缩成一条狭窄的峰.

sentences.en: There is a lengthy article on Spike Milligan in the Observer newspaper.
sentences.cn: 《观察家报》上有一篇关于斯派克·米利根的长篇文章。

sentences.en: They'll do anything to spike the guns of the opposition.
sentences.cn: 他们会使出各种手段来挫败对手.

sentences.en: When I was running the urine, I found another spike that I couldn't identify.
sentences.cn: 当我检验尿布的时候, 我发现了另一颗无法识别的钉子.

sentences.en: Yellowing receipts had been impaled on a metal spike.
sentences.cn: 发黄的收据被穿在一根金属钉上。

words.tran_cn: 尖的；有穗的；加入标准的
大钉一般的；装有大钉的；尖刻的；易怒的；有穗的
长钉，[铁路]道钉；钉鞋；细高跟
阻止；以大钉钉牢；用尖物刺穿

trans.tran_cn: 尖状物，（防滑）鞋钉，穗，猛增
trans.tran_en: shoes with metal points on the bottom, worn by people who run races, play golf etc

trans.tran_cn: 阻止；以大钉钉牢；用尖物刺穿
trans.tran_en: to prevent someone from saying something or printing something in a newspaper

trans.tran_cn: 加烈酒于，用尖物刺入，阻止…传播；拒绝发表
